TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RelatedObjectQuery extends System.Management.WqlObjectQuery

summary.span: 表示 WQL ASSOCIATORS OF 数据查询。

span.span: Represents a WQL *ASSOCIATORS OF* data query.

summary.span: 它可以用于实例查询和架构查询。

span.span: It can be used for both instances and schema queries.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 如果可以将指定的字符串成功地分析为 WQL 查询，则认为该字符串是查询字符串；否则，将假定它是查询的源对象的路径。

span.span: If the specified string can be successfully parsed as a WQL query, it is considered to be the query string; otherwise, it is assumed to be the path of the source object for the query.

summary.span: 在此情况下，假定该查询为实例查询。

span.span: In this case, the query is assumed to be an instance query.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ClassDefinitionsOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对于符合查询的所有实例只返回它们的类定义。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating that for all instances that adhere to the query, only their class definitions be returned.

summary.span: 此参数只对实例查询有效。

span.span: This parameter is only valid for instance queries.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示对于符合查询的所有实例只返回它们的类定义。

span.span: Returns a value indicating that for all instances that adhere to the query, only their class definitions are to be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的标志。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new flag. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果查询请求的结果集中; 只能使用类定义，否则为`false`。`true` if the query requests only class definitions of the result set; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsSchemaQuery { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示这是架构查询还是实例查询。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a schema query or an instance query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示这是否为架构查询。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether this is a schema query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的查询类型。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果此查询应求得架构;`false`如果查询应求得实例。`true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
